CustomField.description: ** System Calculated Override ** The name that should be displayed when the Business Group is referenced on Invoices and other external pages and documents. Defaults to the "Name" defined for the Business Group.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated Override ** The name that should be displayed when the Business Group is referenced on Invoices and other external pages and documents. Defaults to the "Name" defined for the Business Group.
CustomField.label: Display Name
